original_text: A path went between the two rows of rooms. It was 50 metres long and 5 metres wide. The entrances to the rooms were on the north side.
korean_text: 그 두 방 사이에 통한 길이 있어 너비는 열 척이요 길이는 백 척이며 그 문들은 북쪽을 향하였으며

sentences.original_text: A path went between the two rows of rooms.
sentences.korean_translation: 길이 두 줄의 방들 사이로 지나갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: The entrances to the rooms were on the north side.
